review: I would have loved this product if my remote didn't die a few months after using it. The remote wasn't dropped and only used with normal conditions. Went to look for the replacement remote and of course they are not available right now. However, people have given the replacement remoter low ratings for it dying in a few months as well. Makes it challenging to even consider ordering a new one once they come in stock. I love amazon and use many of there products but very disappointed in this product and feel like my money was taken on this one.
author: Amazon Customer
